title: L Squared Capital Partners Marks Milestone 10th Acquisition at BTX Precision with Addition of High Tech Solutions
summary: NEWPORT BEACH, Calif.--(BUSINESS WIRE)--L Squared Capital Partners is pleased to announce that its portfolio company, BTX Precision (BTX or the Company), has acquired High Tech Solutions LLC (HTS), a Kansas City based precision manufacturer of aerospace components serving the commercial, business jet, and space end markets. The acquisition marks BTXs 10th transaction since the platforms inception, further cementing its position as the nations most trusted provider of advanced build-to-
